thread.title: UK Calls For International Tribunal On MH17
thread.title_full: UK Calls For International Tribunal On MH17

author: Reuters
title: UK Calls For International Tribunal On MH17
text:
British Foreign Secretary Philip Hammond has backed calls for an international tribunal to prosecute those suspected of shooting Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 out of the sky over rebel-held eastern Ukraine a year ago. His call came as commemorations were held in the Netherlands and Ukraine to mark the anniversary of the downing of MH17, killing 298 passengers and crew.
Western governments believe the rebels shot down the plane with a Russian-supplied BUK missile system, a version based on radio intercepts, photographic and video evidence, witness statements and satellite imagery. Russia denies involvement in the Ukrainian conflict.
Dutch authorities have said they are not yet ready to identify culprits, but have called for a UN tribunal.
A report on the cause of the crash from the Dutch Safety Board, a preliminary copy of which has been circulated to half a dozen government with nationals onboard, is due in October.
(Reuters)
